sn35.120:1.1: Ekam samayam ayasma sariputto savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
sn35.120:1.2: Atha kho annataro bhikkhu yenayasma sariputto tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmata sariputtena saddhim sammodi.
sn35.120:1.3: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho so bhikkhu ayasmantam sariputtam etadavoca:
sn35.120:1.4: “saddhivihariko, avuso sariputta, bhikkhu sikkham paccakkhaya hinayavatto”ti.
sn35.120:2.1: “Evametam, avuso, hoti indriyesu aguttadvarassa, bhojane amattannuno, jagariyam ananuyuttassa.
sn35.120:2.2: ‘So vatavuso, bhikkhu indriyesu aguttadvaro bhojane amattannu jagariyam ananuyutto yavajivam paripunnam parisuddham brahmacariyam santanessati’ti netam thanam vijjati.
sn35.120:2.3: ‘So vatavuso, bhikkhu indriyesu guttadvaro, bhojane mattannu, jagariyam anuyutto yavajivam paripunnam parisuddham brahmacariyam santanessati’ti thanametam vijjati.
sn35.120:3.2: Idhavuso, bhikkhu cakkhuna rupam disva na nimittaggahi hoti nanubyanjanaggahi.
sn35.120:3.3: Yatvadhikaranamenam cakkhundriyam asamvutam viharantam abhijjhadomanassa papaka akusala dhamma anvassaveyyum tassa samvaraya patipajjati, rakkhati cakkhundriyam, cakkhundriye samvaram apajjati.
sn35.120:3.8: manasa dhammam vinnaya na nimittaggahi hoti nanubyanjanaggahi.
sn35.120:3.9: Yatvadhikaranamenam manindriyam asamvutam viharantam abhijjhadomanassa papaka akusala dhamma anvassaveyyum, tassa samvaraya patipajjati, rakkhati manindriyam, manindriye samvaram apajjati.
sn35.120:3.10: Evam kho, avuso, indriyesu guttadvaro hoti.
sn35.120:4.2: Idhavuso, bhikkhu patisankha yoniso aharam ahareti:
sn35.120:4.3: ‘neva davaya, na madaya, na mandanaya, na vibhusanaya, yavadeva imassa kayassa thitiya yapanaya, vihimsuparatiya, brahmacariyanuggahaya. Iti purananca vedanam patihankhami, navanca vedanam na uppadessami, yatra ca me bhavissati, anavajjata ca phasuviharo ca’ti.
sn35.120:4.4: Evam kho, avuso, bhojane mattannu hoti.
sn35.120:5.2: Idhavuso, bhikkhu divasam cankamena nisajjaya avaraniyehi dhammehi cittam parisodheti.
sn35.120:5.3: Rattiya pathamam yamam cankamena nisajjaya avaraniyehi dhammehi cittam parisodheti.
sn35.120:5.4: Rattiya majjhimam yamam dakkhinena passena sihaseyyam kappeti pade padam accadhaya sato sampajano, utthanasannam manasi karitva.
sn35.120:5.5: Rattiya pacchimam yamam paccutthaya cankamena nisajjaya avaraniyehi dhammehi cittam parisodheti.
sn35.120:5.6: Evam kho, avuso, jagariyam anuyutto hoti.
sn35.120:5.8: ‘indriyesu guttadvara bhavissama, bhojane mattannuno, jagariyam anuyutta’ti.
